body.p:
179
Octr 24" 3.
Gen Lo Thomas
Adj't Genl U. S. A.
General.

I am instructed by the Governor to request the discharge of Joseph Herd private Coy. D. 7" Infantry Regt Ky Vols. in the service of the United states, that he may receive promotion in the 47" Ky Infy. which Regiment was organized under the Act of Congress entitled "An Act to authorize the raising of a Voluntary force for the better defence of Kentucky," approved Feby 7. 1863.

I am General
Very respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
